H0.text: Radiation is the form of vibrations in the air caused by hitting a drum.

H1.text: Light is the vibrations in the air caused by hitting a drum.

H2.text: Electricity is formed by vibrations in the air caused by hitting a drum.

H3.text: Sound is vibrations in the air caused by hitting a drum.

A4.text: Sound is a vibration that propagates as an acoustic wave through a transmission medium such as a gas, liquid or solid.

A5.text: The sound source creates vibrations in the surrounding medium.
